block.p: The blurb, ''What happens when her weekly reader is People?'' is very telling. My ''weekly reader'' at home was Family Circle and the Ladies' Home Journal, and Readers' Digest and National Geographic when at my grandparents' house. My own children turned to National Geographic when they finished their Ranger Rick and American Girl magazines, and now two of them are pursing science, while the third studied linguistics in college.
